title: Extrinsically conducting MOFs: guest-promoted enhancement of electrical conductivity, thin film fabrication and applications
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00141A, Review Article
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Rajat Saha, Carlos J. Gómez García
We present a review of extrinsically conducting MOFs prepared by insertion of different electroactive guests. The structures, conductivity modulation, paths, guest-MOF interactions, thin film fabrication and applications of ec-MOFs are also presented.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
